java/liquibase/database/template/JdbcOutputTemplate.java

00001 package liquibase.database.template;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00006 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00007 
00008 import java.io.IOException;
00009 import java.io.Writer;
00010 
00011 public class JdbcOutputTemplate extends JdbcTemplate {
00012 
00013     private Writer output;
00014 
00015     public JdbcOutputTemplate(Writer output, Database database) {
00016         super(database);
00017         this.output = output;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public boolean executesStatements() {
00021         return false;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public void execute(SqlStatement sql) throws JDBCException {
00025         outputStatement(sql);
00026     }
00027 
00028     public int update(SqlStatement sql) throws JDBCException {
00029         outputStatement(sql);
00030 
00031         return 0;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void comment(String message) throws JDBCException {
00035         try {
00036             output.write(database.getLineComment());
00037             output.write(" ");
00038             output.write(message);
00039             output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00040         } catch (IOException e) {
00041             throw new JDBCException(e);
00042         }
00043     }
00044 
00045     private void outputStatement(SqlStatement sql) throws JDBCException {
00046         try {
00047             output.write(sql.getSqlStatement(database));
00048             output.write(";");
00049             output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00050             output.write(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00051         } catch (IOException e) {
00052             throw new JDBCException(e);
00053         }
00054     }
00055 }
